005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.StringAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLineAdapter;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.JsonGroupAsBehavior;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValue;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValues;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundAssembly;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundField;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.GroupAs;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.ValueConstraints;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.ITargetedConstraintBase;
026
027import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
028import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
029
030import java.util.LinkedList;
031import java.util.List;
032
033@SuppressWarnings({
034    "PMD.DataClass",
035    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
036})
037@MetaschemaAssembly(
038    formalName = "Allowed Values Constraint",
039    name = "targeted-allowed-values-constraint",
040    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
041public class TargetedAllowedValuesConstraint implements IBoundObject, ITargetedConstraintBase {
042  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
043
044  @BoundFlag(
045      formalName = "Constraint Identifier",
046      name = "id",
047      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
048  private String _id;
049
050  @BoundFlag(
051      formalName = "Constraint Severity Level",
052      name = "level",
053      defaultValue = "ERROR",
054      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
055      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR, values = {
056          @AllowedValue(value = "CRITICAL",
057              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a serious fault in the content that will prevent typical use of the content."),
058          @AllowedValue(value = "ERROR",
059              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a fault in the content. This may include issues around compatibility, integrity, consistency, etc."),
060          @AllowedValue(value = "WARNING",
061              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a potential issue with the content."),
062          @AllowedValue(value = "INFORMATIONAL",
063              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a point of interest."),
064          @AllowedValue(value = "DEBUG",
065              description = "A violation of the constraint represents a fault in the content that may warrant review by a developer when performing model or tool development.") })))
066  private String _level;
067
068  @BoundFlag(
069      formalName = "Allow Non-Enumerated Values?",
070      name = "allow-other",
071      defaultValue = "no",
072      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
073      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR,
074          values = { @AllowedValue(value = "no", description = "Other value are not allowed."),
075              @AllowedValue(value = "yes", description = "Other values are allowed.") })))
076  private String _allowOther;
077
078  /**
079   * "Determines if the given enumerated values may be extended by other allowed
080   * value constraints."
081   */
082  @BoundFlag(
083      formalName = "Allow Extension?",
084      description = "Determines if the given enumerated values may be extended by other allowed value constraints.",
085      name = "extensible",
086      defaultValue = "external",
087      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
088      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR,
089          values = {
090              @AllowedValue(value = "model", description = "Can be extended by constraints within the same module."),
091              @AllowedValue(value = "external", description = "Can be extended by external constraints."),
092              @AllowedValue(value = "none", description = "Cannot be extended.") })))
093  private String _extensible;
094
095  @BoundFlag(
096      formalName = "Constraint Target Metapath Expression",
097      name = "target",
098      required = true,
099      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
100  private String _target;
101
102  @BoundField(
103      formalName = "Formal Name",
104      description = "A formal name for the data construct, to be presented in documentation.",
105      useName = "formal-name")
106  private String _formalName;
107
108  @BoundField(
109      formalName = "Description",
110      description = "A short description of the data construct's purpose, describing the constructs semantics.",
111      useName = "description",
112      typeAdapter = MarkupLineAdapter.class)
113  private MarkupLine _description;
114
115  @BoundAssembly(
116      formalName = "Property",
117      useName = "prop",
118      maxOccurs = -1,
119      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "props", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
120  private List<Property> _props;
121
122  @BoundField(
123      formalName = "Allowed Value Enumeration",
124      useName = "enum",
125      minOccurs = 1,
126      maxOccurs = -1,
127      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "enums", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
128  private List<ConstraintValueEnum> _enums;
129
130  @BoundField(
131      formalName = "Remarks",
132      description = "Any explanatory or helpful information to be provided about the remarks parent.",
133      useName = "remarks")
134  private Remarks _remarks;
135
136  public TargetedAllowedValuesConstraint() {
137    this(null);
138  }
139
140  public TargetedAllowedValuesConstraint(IMetaschemaData data) {
141    this.__metaschemaData = data;
142  }
143
144  @Override
145  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
146    return __metaschemaData;
147  }
148
149  @Override
150  public String getId() {
151    return _id;
152  }
153
154  public void setId(String value) {
155    _id = value;
156  }
157
158  @Override
159  public String getLevel() {
160    return _level;
161  }
162
163  public void setLevel(String value) {
164    _level = value;
165  }
166
167  public String getAllowOther() {
168    return _allowOther;
169  }
170
171  public void setAllowOther(String value) {
172    _allowOther = value;
173  }
174
175  public String getExtensible() {
176    return _extensible;
177  }
178
179  public void setExtensible(String value) {
180    _extensible = value;
181  }
182
183  @Override
184  public String getTarget() {
185    return _target;
186  }
187
188  public void setTarget(String value) {
189    _target = value;
190  }
191
192  @Override
193  public String getFormalName() {
194    return _formalName;
195  }
196
197  public void setFormalName(String value) {
198    _formalName = value;
199  }
200
201  @Override
202  public MarkupLine getDescription() {
203    return _description;
204  }
205
206  public void setDescription(MarkupLine value) {
207    _description = value;
208  }
209
210  @Override
211  public List<Property> getProps() {
212    return _props;
213  }
214
215  public void setProps(List<Property> value) {
216    _props = value;
217  }
218
219  /**
220   * Add a new {@link Property} item to the underlying collection.
221   *
222   * @param item
223   *          the item to add
224   * @return {@code true}
225   */
226  public boolean addProp(Property item) {
227    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
228    if (_props == null) {
229      _props = new LinkedList<>();
230    }
231    return _props.add(value);
232  }
233
234  /**
235   * Remove the first matching {@link Property} item from the underlying
236   * collection.
237   *
238   * @param item
239   *          the item to remove
240   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
241   */
242  public boolean removeProp(Property item) {
243    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
244    return _props != null && _props.remove(value);
245  }
246
247  public List<ConstraintValueEnum> getEnums() {
248    return _enums;
249  }
250
251  public void setEnums(List<ConstraintValueEnum> value) {
252    _enums = value;
253  }
254
255  /**
256   * Add a new {@link ConstraintValueEnum} item to the underlying collection.
257   *
258   * @param item
259   *          the item to add
260   * @return {@code true}
261   */
262  public boolean addEnum(ConstraintValueEnum item) {
263    ConstraintValueEnum value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
264    if (_enums == null) {
265      _enums = new LinkedList<>();
266    }
267    return _enums.add(value);
268  }
269
270  /**
271   * Remove the first matching {@link ConstraintValueEnum} item from the
272   * underlying collection.
273   *
274   * @param item
275   *          the item to remove
276   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
277   */
278  public boolean removeEnum(ConstraintValueEnum item) {
279    ConstraintValueEnum value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
280    return _enums != null && _enums.remove(value);
281  }
282
283  @Override
284  public Remarks getRemarks() {
285    return _remarks;
286  }
287
288  public void setRemarks(Remarks value) {
289    _remarks = value;
290  }
291
292  @Override
293  public String toString() {
294    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
295  }
296}
